title: DEAD SECTOR
description: A top-down survival shooter created in Unity. Players must manage resources, fend off waves of enemies, and survive as long as possible in a post-apocalyptic world. My role focused on player controls and enemy AI.

title: Cosmic Drift
description: An arcade-style spaceship shooter developed in Unity. Features dynamic enemy waves and a power-up system. I implemented the core gameplay loop and the scoring system.

title: This Portfolio
description: My personal portfolio site, built from scratch with vanilla HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to be fast, lightweight, and easy to deploy on GitHub Pages. It dynamically loads project data from a single JSON file.
